text: Other Wikimedia projects also contain material on this topic: Commons images and media Wikispecies directory * Commons * Wikispecies Alisma L. is a botanical genus in the family Alismataceae. == Species == * Alisma acanthocarpa * Alpine alisma * Alisma ancile * Alisma andrieuxii * Alisma angustifolium * Alisma annuum * Alisma apetalum * Alisma aphylla * Alisma arcuatum * Alisma batrachiocarpum * Alisma berterii * Alisma berteroanum * Alisma berteroi * Alisma bjorkqvistii * Bolivian Alisma * Alisma bolivianum * Alisma bourgaei * Alisma brevipes * Alisma californicum * Alisma canaliculatum * Alisma cordifolium * Alisma flavum * Alisma gramineum * Alisma grandiflorum * Alisma lanceolatum * Alisma natans * Alisma orientale * Alisma parnassifolium * Plantago-aquatic alisma * Alisma rostratum * Alisma subcordatum * Alisma tenellum == Genre classification == System Classification Reference Linne Hexandria class, order Polygynia Species plantarum (1753) Category:Aquatic plants Category:Plants of Indo-China Category:Plants of Asia Category:Plants of Australia Category:Alismatales
title: Alisma
